      {

            $ErrorTemplate = str_replace( '{exception_message}' , $e->getMessage() , $ErrorTemplate );

            {
                  print( 
                        str_replace( 
                              '{download}' , '&nbsp;<a href="./log/exception.last.zip">download</a>' , $ErrorTemplate 
                        ) 
                  );

process_script_error ( $  Visualisation,
$  e 
)

Function processes execution errors.

Parameters:
$Visualisation - Should the trace info be outputted.
$e - Exception object.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 147 of file startup.php.

      {
            global      $DEBUG;
            
            if( $DEBUG )
            {
                  $ErrorTemplate = common_error_message_processing( $Visualisation , $e );
                  
                  $Handle = fopen( './log/exception.log' , 'at' );
                  fwrite( $Handle , $e->getMessage().'<hr width="90%">' );
                  fclose( $Handle );
                  
                  $Handle = fopen( './log/exception.last.html' , 'wt' );
                  fwrite( $Handle , str_replace( '{download}' , '' , $ErrorTemplate ) );
                  fclose( $Handle );
                  
                  @unlink( './log/exception.last.zip' );
                  $zip = new ZipArchive();
                  $zip->open( './log/exception.last.zip' , ZIPARCHIVE::CREATE );
                  $zip->addFromString( 'exception.html' , str_replace( '{download}' , '' , $ErrorTemplate ) );
            }
      }
